name: Carousel
description: Carousel is a component for switch between slides

properties.name: imagesData
properties.label: Images Data
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine data for images slide.

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine image height.

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine image width.

properties.name: autoplayDelay
properties.label: Autoplay Delay(ms)
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the delay between automatically cycling an item. If this property doesn't set or equal 0, the carousel will not automatically cycle.

properties.name: animationDuration
properties.label: Animation Duration (ms)
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the duration of animation.

properties.name: withControls
properties.label: With Controls
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the control buttons should be visible. If the handler returns true, the component will be visible.

properties.name: withIndicators
properties.label: With Indicators
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if the indicators should be visible. If the handler returns true, the component will be visible.

eventHandlers.name: onNextButton
eventHandlers.label: On Next Button
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This handler is triggered when the user clicks on the next button

eventHandlers.name: onPrevButton
eventHandlers.label: On Previous Button
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This handler is triggered when the user clicks on the previous button

eventHandlers.name: onMouseEnter
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Enter
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the Mouse Enters the component.

eventHandlers.name: onMouseLeave
eventHandlers.label: On Mouse Leave
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the mouse leaves the component.
